metadata.title: CVE-2021-43008 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Access Control in Adminer versions 1.12.0 to 4.6.2 (fixed inversion 4.6.3) allows an attacker to achieve Arbitrary File Read on theremote server by requesting the Adminer to connect to a remote MySQLdatabase.

criterions.comment: adminer package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
